data.message: Eminem do you want to faumes.sing about amigrent

replies.message:
Jack I apologise for my conduct before hand..
I'm "presuming" your a STAN but Stan or Jack and I'm serious.. How dare you even contemplate giving  Eminem advice on what  topic the "RapGod" should use to rinse out and create "ANOTHER" Masterpiece!

Does he even sound like he needs help with his lyrics!!
     You don't respect the skill of the lyrical genius he is..
Go listen to some Kanye West!!!!!
